languages.text: "И что же вы предлагаете? Отдать Дитя вам, на произвол судьбы выкинуть с незнаком{mf|цем|кой} в тьму галактики? Одну?" {n}Голос навигатора срывается на крик.{/n} "Нет, я не позволю!.." {n}Теобальд Орселлио заслоняет собой тело девушки, и воздух вокруг него наполняется жаром.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "И что же вы предлагаете? Отдать Дитя вам, на произвол судьбы выкинуть с незнаком{mf|цем|кой} в тьму галактики? Одну?" {n}Голос Навигатора срывается на крик.{/n} "Нет, я не позволю!.." {n}Теобальд Орселлио заслоняет собой тело девушки, и воздух вокруг него наполняется жаром.{/n}

languages.text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И что же вы предлагаете? Отдать Дитя вам, на произвол судьбы выкинуть с незнаком{mf|цем|кой} в тьму галактики? Одну?" {n}Голос навигатора срывается на крик.{/n} "Нет, я не позволю!.." {n}Теобальд Орселлио заслоняет собой тело девушки, и воздух вокруг него наполняется жаром.{/n}

Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

"So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

"So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

languages.text: “那你有什么打算？你要我把圣子交给你，让她任由命运的操弄吗？你要我把她丢到银河系的黑暗之中，身边只有个陌生人吗？你要我留下她独自一人吗？”{n}导航者的话语变成了咆哮。{/n}“不！我绝不允许！”{n}西奥巴德站在卡西娅身边，守护着她。他周围的空气变得燥热不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那你有什么打算？你要我把这孩子交给你，让她任由命运的操弄吗？你要我把她丢到银河系的黑暗之中，身边只有个陌生人吗？你要我留下她独自一人吗？”{n}导航者的话语变成了咆哮。{/n}“不！我绝不允许！”{n}西奥巴德站在卡西娅身边，守护着她。他周围的空气变得燥热不安。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué propone, exactamente? ¿Que le entregue a la niña y la abandone a merced del destino, en la oscuridad de la galaxia, con un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}? ¿Sola?». {n}La voz del Navegante se convierte en un grito.{/n} «¡No, no lo permitiré!». {n}Theobald se alza sobre el cuerpo de Cassia, protegiéndola, y el aire que le rodea se vuelve sofocante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué propone, exactamente? ¿Que le entregue a la niña y la abandone a merced del destino, en la oscuridad de la galaxia, con un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}? ¿Sola?». {n}La voz del Navegante se convierte en un grito.{/n} «¡No, no lo permitiré!». {n}Theobald se alza sobre el cuerpo de Cassia, protegiéndola, y el aire que le rodea se vuelve sofocante.{/n}

languages.text: 「それで、あなたは何を提案したいのだ？この『子ども』をあなたに引き渡し、運命の慈悲にゆだね、見知らぬ男と銀河の闇に放り出せと？たった一人で？」{n}航宙士は声を荒げた。{/n}「いいや、そのようなことは許されぬ！」{n}テオバルドはカシアの遺体の上に立ち、庇った。彼の周囲の空気が蒸し暑くなっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それで、あなたは何を提案したいのだ？この『子ども』をあなたに引き渡し、運命の慈悲にゆだね、見知らぬ男と銀河の闇に放り出せと？たった一人で？」{n}航宙士は声を荒げた。{/n}「いいや、そのようなことは許されぬ！」{n}テオバルドはカシアの遺体の上に立ち、庇った。彼の周囲の空気が蒸し暑くなっていく。{/n}

languages.text: "Was schlagt Ihr also vor? Dass ich Euch das Kind überlasse, sie der Gnade des Schicksals ausliefere, sie mit {mf|einem|einer} Fremden in die Dunkelheit der Galaxie werfe? Allein?" {n}Die Stimme des Navigators bricht, er schreit nun fast.{/n} "Nein, das lasse ich nicht zu!" {n}Theobald steht über Cassia, schützt ihren Körper, und die Luft um ihn herum wird drückend heiß.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was schlagt Ihr also vor? Dass ich Euch das Kind überlasse, sie der Gnade des Schicksals ausliefere, sie mit {mf|einem|einer} Fremden in die Dunkelheit der Galaxie werfe? Allein?" {n}Die Stimme des Navigators bricht, er schreit nun fast.{/n} "Nein, das lasse ich nicht zu!" {n}Theobald steht über Cassia, schützt ihren Körper, und die Luft um ihn herum wird drückend heiß.{/n}

languages.text: « Et que suggérez-vous, dans ce cas ? Que je vous livre l'Enfant ? Que je l'abandonne aux caprices du destin, en la précipitant dans les ténèbres de la galaxie avec {mf|un inconnu|une inconnue} ? Seule ? Jamais ! Je ne le permettrai pas ! » {n}rétorque le navigateur en criant, puis il se place devant Cassia pour la protéger. L'air autour de lui devient suffocant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et que suggérez-vous, dans ce cas ? Que je vous livre l'Enfant ? Que je l'abandonne aux caprices du destin, en la précipitant dans les ténèbres de la galaxie avec {mf|un inconnu|une inconnue} ? Seule ? Jamais ! Je ne le permettrai pas ! » {n}rétorque le navigateur en criant, puis il se place devant Cassia pour la protéger. L'air autour de lui devient suffocant.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne öneriyorsun yani? Çocuk'u sana teslim etmemi, kaderin merhametine bırakmamı, bir yabancının yanında galaksinin karanlığına yollamamı mı?" {n}Rotacı'nın sesi giderek yükselerek bir bağırışa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Hayır, asla müsaade etmem!" {n}Theobald, Cassia'nın bedeninin önünde dikilerek ona siper oluyor, çevresindeki hava ise giderek bunaltıcı bir hâl alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So what are you proposing? That I hand over the Child to you, abandon her to the mercy of fate, cast her out into the darkness of the galaxy with a stranger? Alone?" {n}The Navigator's voice breaks into a shout.{/n} "No, I will not allow it!" {n}Theobald stands over Cassia's body, shielding it, and the air around him turns sweltering.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne öneriyorsun yani? Çocuk'u sana teslim etmemi, kaderin merhametine bırakmamı, bir yabancının yanında galaksinin karanlığına yollamamı mı?" {n}Rotacı'nın sesi giderek yükselerek bir bağırışa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Hayır, asla müsaade etmem!" {n}Theobald, Cassia'nın bedeninin önünde dikilerek ona siper oluyor, çevresindeki hava ise giderek bunaltıcı bir hâl alıyor.{/n}
